languages.text: "Змееныш оказался на редкость живучим — у него под шкурой столько {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментов{/g} жизнеобеспечения. Я решил, что новый питомец станет приятным бонусом к победе и логову. Должны ведь новички отрабатывать на ком-то стрельбу?"

traits.locale_text: "Змееныш оказался на редкость живучим — у него под шкурой столько {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментов{/g} жизнеобеспечения. Я решил, что новый питомец станет приятным бонусом к победе и логову. Должны ведь новички отрабатывать на ком-то стрельбу?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "The viper is surprisingly hard to kill — he's chock full of life support {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g}. I figured a new pet would be a nice bonus to claiming victory and having the den back. Besides, new recruits need a target to practise their aim on, right?"
languages.original_text: "Змееныш оказался на редкость живучим — у него под шкурой столько {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментов{/g} жизнеобеспечения. Я решил, что новый питомец станет приятным бонусом к победе и логову. Должны ведь новички отрабатывать на ком-то стрельбу?"

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "The viper is surprisingly hard to kill — he's chock full of life support {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g}. I figured a new pet would be a nice bonus to claiming victory and having the den back. Besides, new recruits need a target to practice their aim on, right?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "The viper is surprisingly hard to kill — he's chock full of life support {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g}. I figured a new pet would be a nice bonus to claiming victory and having the den back. Besides, new recruits need a target to practise their aim on, right?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “那条毒蛇很难弄死，它的身体里装满了用来维持生命的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。我们获得了这场胜利，占领了这个巢穴，我猜我们可以拿它当宠物。而且，新兵们也需要一个用来练习射击的靶子，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: "The viper is surprisingly hard to kill — he's chock full of life support {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g}. I figured a new pet would be a nice bonus to claiming victory and having the den back. Besides, new recruits need a target to practise their aim on, right?"

traits.locale_text: “那条毒蛇很难弄死，它的身体里装满了用来维持生命的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。我们获得了这场胜利，占领了这个巢穴，我猜我们可以拿它当宠物。而且，新兵们也需要一个用来练习射击的靶子，没错吧？”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「この蛇はかなりしぶとくて…生命維持のための{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}が大量に埋め込まれているのです。勝利と住処を取り戻したお祝いに新しいペットを飼うのも悪くないと思いました。それに、新兵の射撃特訓のいい練習台になるでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "The viper is surprisingly hard to kill — he's chock full of life support {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g}. I figured a new pet would be a nice bonus to claiming victory and having the den back. Besides, new recruits need a target to practise their aim on, right?"

traits.locale_text: 「この蛇はかなりしぶとくて…生命維持のための{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}が大量に埋め込まれているのです。勝利と住処を取り戻したお祝いに新しいペットを飼うのも悪くないと思いました。それに、新兵の射撃特訓のいい練習台になるでしょう？」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «La víbora es sorprendentemente difícil de matar; está lleno de {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}auméticos{/g} de soporte vital. Supuse que una nueva mascota sería un buen añadido a obtener la victoria y recuperar nuestra guarida. Además, los nuevos reclutas necesitan un objetivo contra el que practicar su puntería, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "The viper is surprisingly hard to kill — he's chock full of life support {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g}. I figured a new pet would be a nice bonus to claiming victory and having the den back. Besides, new recruits need a target to practise their aim on, right?"

traits.locale_text: «La víbora es sorprendentemente difícil de matar; está lleno de {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}auméticos{/g} de soporte vital. Supuse que una nueva mascota sería un buen añadido a obtener la victoria y recuperar nuestra guarida. Además, los nuevos reclutas necesitan un objetivo contra el que practicar su puntería, ¿no?».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "The viper is surprisingly hard to kill — he's chock full of life support augmetics. I figured a new pet would be a nice bonus to claiming victory and having the den back. Besides, new recruits need a target to practice their aim on, right?"

languages.text: « J'ai rarement connu un serpent plus difficile à tuer. Il est bardé des pieds à la tête d'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétiques{/g} qui le maintiennent en vie. Je me suis dit qu'après cette belle victoire, et maintenant qu'on a repris le repaire, un nouvel animal de compagnie serait un chouette bonus. Et puis les nouvelles recrues ont besoin d'une cible pour s'entraîner à viser. »
languages.original_text: "The viper is surprisingly hard to kill — he's chock full of life support {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g}. I figured a new pet would be a nice bonus to claiming victory and having the den back. Besides, new recruits need a target to practise their aim on, right?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai rarement connu un serpent plus difficile à tuer. Il est bardé des pieds à la tête d'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétiques{/g} qui le maintiennent en vie. Je me suis dit qu'après cette belle victoire, et maintenant qu'on a repris le repaire, un nouvel animal de compagnie serait un chouette bonus. Et puis les nouvelles recrues ont besoin d'une cible pour s'entraîner à viser. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Die Viper ist überraschend schwer umzubringen – er hat Unmengen von {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} zur Lebenserhaltung. Ich dachte, zum Sieg und der Rückeroberung des Unterschlupfs wäre ein neues Haustier ein hübscher Bonus. Außerdem brauchen neue Rekruten doch ein Übungsziel zum Anvisieren, oder?"
languages.original_text: "The viper is surprisingly hard to kill — he's chock full of life support {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g}. I figured a new pet would be a nice bonus to claiming victory and having the den back. Besides, new recruits need a target to practise their aim on, right?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Viper ist überraschend schwer umzubringen – er hat Unmengen von {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} zur Lebenserhaltung. Ich dachte, zum Sieg und der Rückeroberung des Unterschlupfs wäre ein neues Haustier ein hübscher Bonus. Außerdem brauchen neue Rekruten doch ein Übungsziel zum Anvisieren, oder?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Yılanı öldürmesi şaşırtıcı derecede zor, her yanı yaşam destek {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetikleriyle{/g} kaplı. Galip gelip ini geri almanın üstüne bir de evcil hayvan edinmek güzel bir bonus olur diye düşündüm. Hem aramıza yeni katılanların atış talimi için hedefe ihtiyacı olacak."
languages.original_text: "The viper is surprisingly hard to kill — he's chock full of life support {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g}. I figured a new pet would be a nice bonus to claiming victory and having the den back. Besides, new recruits need a target to practise their aim on, right?"

traits.locale_text: "Yılanı öldürmesi şaşırtıcı derecede zor, ağzına kadar yaşam destek {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetikler{/g}iyle dolu. Zafer kazanıp ini geri almanın üstüne bir de evcil hayvan edinmek güzel bir bonus olur diye düşündüm. Ayrıca yeni gelenlerin atış talimi yapmak için bir hedefe ihtiyacı olacak, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
